Journal.Title: Canadian journal of physiology and pharmacology

Article.ArticleTitle: Pharmacological uses and perspectives of heavy water and deuterated compounds.

Abstract.AbstractText: Both "solvent isotope effects," those due to the special properties of D20 as a solvent, and "deuterium isotope effects" (DIE), which result when D replaces H in many biological molecules, are considered.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Botany, University of Toronto, ON, Canada. kushner@botany.utoronto.ca
